name: Super Space Shooter 2017
description:
My first ever game, made at the age of 14! Refreshed juicy, fun classic Space Shooter!
  • If you'll use GameJolt account you're able to get 7 cool achievements and compete with others on scoreboard!!
  • Few powerups and enemies
  • Singleplayer
  • 3 Cool soundtracks

#retro #scifi
